content.body: I want to give a shout out to nicolo-ribaudo for some really exemplary work interfacing with a grouchy host maintainer (me) in https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/8253#issuecomment-1236820949 . content.body: https://github.com/babel/babel/pull/14877 references `tc39/ecma262#2819` in the commit title, which DependaBot is copying into PRs to update Babel, which GH renders as a backlink to the ecma262 PR.
